author: Squidward
textcontent: "I'll have you know that I stubbed my toe last week and only cried for 20 minutes." - SpongeBob

author: Patrick
textcontent: Check out this video I found :)

author: SpongeBob
textcontent:
You can do whatever you set your mind to 
 Be kind to everyone but not to the point of death
You can't spell fun without friends
Own your mistakes, no matter the consequences
Our identities shouldn't be made into jokes
Find positivity in everything you do
Not being cool can actually be very cool

author: Sandy
textcontent: Nothing makes me feel better than a laugh.

author: Plankton
textcontent: Gotta get that secret recipe, I am hungry

author: Mr.Krabs
textcontent: I went to a fancy restaurant today, did not pay.

author: SpongeBob
textcontent: Anybody coming to movienight tonight? I have some games planned and some pop kelp made.
